ygData.msgSnippet: OOps sorry, I got mixed up. I must ve been thinking of a different character. Prebon knew the moment he heard  Shivah use his rank that he had control.  I ll

OOps sorry, I got mixed up. I must've been thinking of a different
character.

Prebon knew the moment he heard  Shivah use his rank that he had control. "
I'll contact you when I'm ready to begin." The Trainer had known few
pleasures like the one he fealt as he bossed the command bot around.

He then sat down at the computer and began studying the maps. The
information was extremely detailed so it would take quite some time before
he'd have a training plan. He entered the archives to learn about his new
lackies. (Please insert the names of whoever he'll be training in the next
message.)
----- Original Message -----
From: <airly2000@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, June 04, 2001 5:11 PM
Subject: Re: It's Showtime
